name: api_core_MonoBehaviour
description: MonoBehaviour is a base class that many Unity scripts derive from.

properties.name: destroyCancellationToken
properties.description: Cancellation token raised when the MonoBehaviour is destroyed (Read Only).

properties.name: didAwake
properties.description: Returns a boolean value which represents if Awake was called.

properties.name: didStart
properties.description: Returns a boolean value which represents if Start was called.

properties.name: runInEditMode
properties.description: Allow a specific instance of a MonoBehaviour to run in edit mode (only available in the editor).

properties.name: useGUILayout
properties.description: Disabling this lets you skip the GUI layout phase.
